Package controller

Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
this class is a controller for the MainForm view. It contains the methods onActionSearchParts, onActionSearchProducts, onActionDisplayAddPart, onActionDisplayAddProduct, onActionDisplayModifyPart, onActionDisplayModifyProduct, onActionDeletePart, onActionDeleteProduct, onActionExit, and initialize

      public MainFormController()

  • Method Details

    • onActionSearchParts

      public void onActionSearchParts()
      method for the search field for the parts table view. it is triggered after a user enters a value and then presses enter. if there are no parts found, an error dialogue box appears.

    • onActionSearchProducts

      public void onActionSearchProducts()
      method for the search field for the products table view. it is triggered after a user enters a value and then presses enter. if there are no products found, an error dialogue box appears.

    • onActionDisplayAddPart

      public void onActionDisplayAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      triggered when the add button under the parts pane is clicked. brings up and sends part data to the AddPartForm view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDisplayModifyPart

      public void onActionDisplayModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      triggered when the modify button under the parts pane is clicked. brings up and sends part data to the ModifyPartForm view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDisplayAddProduct

      public void onActionDisplayAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      triggered when the add button under the products pane is clicked. brings up the AddProductForm view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDisplayModifyProduct

      public void onActionDisplayModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      triggered when the modify button under products pane is clicked. brings up and sends product data to the ModifyProductForm view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDeletePart

      public void onActionDeletePart()
      triggered when the delete button is clicked under the parts pane. a confirmation pops up confirming the user wants to delete the part and a logical error check is performed to see if the part is successfully deleted.

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      public void onActionDeleteProduct()
      triggered when the delete button is clicked under the products pane. a confirmation pops up confirming the user wants to delete the product and a logical error check is performed for whether the product has associated parts and if the product was able to be successfully deleted.

    • onActionExit

      public void onActionExit()
      triggered when the exit button is clicked. closes the application.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initializes the controller by populating the table views
